Mallet: If you're here to talk me--
Marina: I wouldn’t.
Mallet: Thanks.
Marina: Partners bring partners coffee.

Josh: Um... just a second. You haven't
answered my question yet.
Cassie: Right, what was the question again?

Josh: It was basically about you and me
shacking up together.

Cassie: I thought I heard something about
that. Would you pay rent?

Josh: Are you just going to give me a hard
time?

Cassie: Yes, I am! Yes, Josh, yes! I want
you to live with me. I want to share my life with you.
Josh: Hmmm! (Laughter) Now we're talking.
Next on "Guiding Light"...

Reva: Before I take my last drive, I'm going
to party like it's my last day on earth. And I have to have the strength to
push the pedal to the meddle and drive off that
bridge, right.
Blake: You make this sound like it's permanent.

Reva: My mind is made up, but I don't know
how I'm going to say good-bye to you.
